name: Little Witch, MD
description:
Broomhilda is the newest (and only) doctor in all of the blasted lands, and she's ready to open her brand new clinic with her trusty familiar, Caduceus. Help Broomhilda treat all the beasties of the realm by formulating healing rituals with your magical crystals in this easily-accessible, CECO-friendly memory game!

Made for Global Game Jam 2016!
